long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time with the Wingmate Chrome extension by automatically tracking communication with your prospects and clients directly back to Wingmate.  See information from Wingmate directly in Outlook to know more about your prospect before you communicate with them and determine next steps afterwards.

With the Wingmate Chrome extension, you are able to:
- View email information that is tracked in both Gmail and Wingmate.
- Send any inbound email back to Wingmate to be tracked, whether it is a prospect, service request or more!
- Automatically track you send to your Leads directly back to Wingmate.  When you send an outbound lead, Wingmate Email will use Launch Events to find corresponding contacts in Wingmate and track the email back, saving you the time of having to copy it back to Wingmate!

This Chrome extension requires a registered Wingmate account starting at $32/month as well as the API Access fee ($99/month).  Connect with our sales team here to learn more: https://wingmateapp.com/request/
